statements: SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, sales_amount FROM SalesReports WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM SalesReports WHERE salesperson_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT salesperson_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesReports GROUP BY salesperson_id
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY report_date
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE salesperson_id = 101 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesReports GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM SalesReports GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_sales DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_id, report_date, sales_amount FROM SalesReports WHERE salesperson_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, report_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_id, report_date, salesperson_id, sales_amount, product_id FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_id, sales_date, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE products_sold > 10;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales_sum FROM sales_reports;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT SUM(products_sold) AS total_products_sold, AVG(total_sales) AS avg_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE sales_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY sales_date ORDER BY avg_sales DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' OR department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT sr.sales_date, sr.products_sold, e.employee_name FROM sales_reports sr JOIN employees e ON sr.report_id = e.employee_id WHERE sr.total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY sr.sales_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SalesReportTable;
SELECT report_id, sales_amount, report_date FROM SalesReportTable ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT person_name, hire_date, region_name, sales_target FROM SalesPersonTable WHERE region_name = 'East';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM ProductTable WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT report_id, sales_amount FROM SalesReportTable WHERE sales_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM SalesReportTable WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, sales_amount, report_date FROM SalesReportTable ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT person_name, hire_date, region_name FROM SalesPersonTable WHERE region_name = 'East';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM ProductTable WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT report_id, sales_amount, report_date FROM SalesReportTable WHERE sales_amount > 1000 AND report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_name, sales_date FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM sales_employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM sales_products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports ORDER BY sales_date DESC, total_sales ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, sales_date, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000 AND sales_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM sales_employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM sales_products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT report_name, sales_date, total_sales, employee_name FROM sales_reports r JOIN sales_transactions t ON r.report_id = t.report_id JOIN sales_employees e ON t.transaction_date = e.hire_date WHERE r.total_sales > 500 AND e.department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY department ASC
SELECT report_id, report_date, sales_amount FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, sales_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager' AND department = 'Sales'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM SalesHistory WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date
